thread.title: Ortiz hits homer number 503, Cleveland still beats Boston

title: Ortiz hits homer number 503, Cleveland still beats Boston
text: Ortiz hits homer number 503, Cleveland still beats Boston OCT 02, 10:44 pm David Ortiz launched career home run number 503, but the Red Sox still couldn't get the win against the Indians. J.R. Smith is a huge fan of David Blatt 0 Comments You may use your Facebook account to add a comment on FoxSports.com , subject to Facebook's Terms of Use and Privacy Policy .
